response_body_spec:
{
 apiSuccess: (if has("apiSuccess") then .apiSuccess else false end),
 errors: ((if .apiSuccess == false and .errors then (.errors | {"errorMsg": (if .errorMsg then .errorMsg elif .errorMsg|has("InnerException") then .errorMsg.InnerException.InnerException.Message else null end), "errorNum": (if .errorNum then .errorNum else null end)}) else null end) // null),
 responses:(if .apiSuccess and .responses then [ if (.responses|type == "object") then .responses |
 {
 last_name: ((if (.name | contains(",")) then ( .name | split(", ") | .[0]) else null end) // null),
 first_name: ((if (.name | contains(",")) then ( .name | split(", ") | .[1]) else null end) // null),
 business_name: ((if (.name | contains(",") | not) then .name else null end) // null),
 cif: ((.guid) // null),
 tin: ((.tin) // null),
 tin_type: (($tin_type[.ssnType]) // null),
 phone:((.primaryPhone) // null),
 email:((.emailAddress) // null),
 address:((.address1) // null),
 customer_details:((.) // null)
 }
 elif (.responses|type == "array") then .responses[] | 
 {
 last_name: ((if (.name | contains(",")) then ( .name | split(", ") | .[0]) else null end) // null),
 first_name: ((if (.name | contains(",")) then ( .name | split(", ") | .[1]) else null end) // null),
 business_name: ((if (.name | contains(",") | not) then .name else null end) // null),
 cif: ((.guid) // null),

 tin_type: (($tin_type[.ssnType]) // null),
 phone:((.primaryPhone) // null),

 }
 else null end
 ]
 else null end)
